rows.label: tev023101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Stella about Chausson.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Stella if she's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Stella about Chausson.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Stella if she's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0001
rows.name:
We officers are aware that not all of New LA's citizens
are on board with Director General Chausson's policies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0002
rows.name:
But the more we allow our ideals to enslave us,
the grimmer our situation will become.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Hopefully some breakthrough opportunity will present
itself eventually. And you've got the look of someone
who just might be able to accomplish that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0004
rows.name:
If you're ever ready to be that opportunity,
let me know and I'll assign you something important.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0010
rows.name:
Are you familiar with the continent comprised of
nothing but wastelands far to the east of New LA?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0013
rows.name:
We're receiving reports of non-naturally occurring
structures in that region.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0014
rows.name:
We need to find some answers about who built these
structures and what became of them, and do it fast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0015
rows.name:
I guess I'll have to post a mission for the Pathfinders
division...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0028
rows.name:
I was surprised at how readily Director General
Chausson accepted the Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0029
rows.name:
Although he DID put them through a rigorous medical
evaluation to make sure they were no danger to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0030
rows.name:
Perhaps he believes that the Ma-non can provide the
guidance we beleaguered humans so desperately need.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0031
rows.name:
Although from my conversations with the Ma-non,
I don't get the sense that they're in such a great
position to help us...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0035
rows.name:
We have reliable reports that confirm the existence
of intelligent life in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0036
rows.name:
Is it possible that another sapient alien race like the
Ma-non is hiding there? Perhaps one that bears us no
ill will?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0037
rows.name:
We could certainly benefit from additional alliances.
We must expand FrontierNav so we can collect more
information![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0038
rows.name:
Director General Chausson is making preparations for
an influx of various kinds of xenoforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0039
rows.name:
The primary concern of our human residents is the
possible effects of unidentified viruses and bacteria.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0040
rows.name:
As of yet, none of our medical examinations have
found anything of the sort.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0041
rows.name:
Since we are able to communicate freely with them,
the major concern now is convincing our current
residents to welcome the xenoforms with open arms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0047
rows.name:
We are truly fortunate to have made friends who
possess talents that we humans lack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0050
rows.name:
We will benefit from the intelligence of the Ma-non,
the strength of the Prone, and, for what it's worth,
the business acumen of the Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0051
rows.name:
A peaceful and prosperous future for humanity on Mira
may soon be within our reach.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023101_MSG0052
rows.name:
We owe that to you, [ST:playername ].
You have my gratitude.[ST:wait ]
